item.title: Privacy Policy
item.content:
Privacy Policy

Forward

It is our policy to state the we will abide by the Privacy Act 1988 and then immediately send all of your data to servers in a small Caribbean island nation which has no laws regarding the use of your personal data

Collection of Your Data

We collect and store every single piece of data about you that we can, your IP address has been logged and we are currently installing a key logger, screen recorder and remote desktop software on your computer. We do this to enhance the user experience and provide the most convenient service on the market.

Sale of Your Data to Third Parties

Look man making all this stuff was hard work, we've got mouths to feed and to be honest there's not that many people out there with $10,000,000 to drop a console the size of the Great Pyramid of Giza, so to make this company solvent we're selling you off to the highest bidder. The human being has been reduced to a database of interests and habits and people pay good money for that shit.
item.author: phil
